content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on processing cases identified by match, including
reviewing the corporate record on DMF matches
determining if the beneficiary or dependent is alive during a review of the DMF match
review of Compensation and Pension Record Interchange (CAPRI) records on DMF matches
conflicting evidence of record on DMF match
telephoning the beneficiary regarding DMF match
beneficiary believed to be deceased based on DMF match
field examination needed based on DMF match
DMF match identifies the Veteran’s spouse
removing a dependent based on DMF match
fraud discovered based on DMF match
claims folder required based on DMF match
, and
terminating awards based on DMF matches
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 2, Section B - Social Security Death Master File (DMF) Match
